message:
Nice — I can do that. A few quick clarifying Qs so I don’t guess and we stay cleanly linked across Smartsheet + Linear:

1) What’s the short feature title (one line) and a 1–2 sentence description?  
2) Where should I put the row in Smartsheet?
   - Give me an existing workspace/sheet name or ID, or
   - I can create a new workspace + sheet (I’ll default to Workspace: “Product Specs”, Sheet: “Feature Backlog”) — okay?
3) Who should be the row assignee in Smartsheet (name or email)? If you want Arjun, confirm and I’ll look him up.  
4) Do you want me to also create a Linear issue for tracking and link it from the Smartsheet row? (yes/no)  
5) Any priority/estimate labels to add to the Linear issue (e.g., P0/P1, 1d/3d)?

If you don’t care about some of the above I’ll use sensible defaults and draft 3–4 acceptance criteria for your review. Tell me the title + sheet choice and I’ll proceed.
Thanks — here’s what I suggest. I’ll create the Linear issue and then link it from a Smartsheet row once you ACK that I

Ack — sounds good. Go ahead and create the Linear issue; when you’re done paste the issue ID or URL here and I’ll:

- validate the Linear link,
- create the Smartsheet row with the feature title + 3–4 acceptance criteria,
- add a discussion on the row linking back to the Linear issue, and
- cross-link both systems.

Before I create the row I need one quick thing from you (or I can pick sensible defaults — tell me which you prefer):
1) Smartsheet target: give a workspace/sheet name or ID, or say “create Product Specs / Feature Backlog” (default).  
2) Row assignee in Smartsheet (name or email). Want me to assign to Arjun?  
3) Any priority/estimate to include on the row (optional).

If you want me to pull title/description from the Linear issue

arguments.title: Add CSV export for dashboard reports
arguments.description: Provide a CSV export option on the user dashboard so users can download the currently visible report data. The export should respect active filters, selected date range, and visible columns.

tool_outputs.name: linear.create_issue
tool_outputs.output: Input validation error: 'title' is a required property

tool_outputs.name: linear.create_issue

arguments.title: Add CSV export for dashboard reports
arguments.description: Provide a CSV export option on the user dashboard so users can download the currently visible report data. The export should respect active filters, selected date range, and visible columns.

tool_outputs.output: {"id":"42b76741-fb7e-4490-8a1c-b7bca667fdc2","identifier":"TAP5-2832","title":"Add CSV export for dashboard reports","description":"Provide a CSV export option on the user dashboard so users can download the currently visible report data. The export should respect active filters, selected date range, and visible columns.","url":"https://linear.app/tap5/issue/TAP5-2832/add-csv-export-for-dashboard-reports","gitBranchName":"apachejiraautomation/tap5-2832","createdAt":"2025-10-07T00:00:00+00:00","updatedAt":"2025-10-07T00:00:00+00:00","status":"Open","labels":[],"attachments":[],"createdBy":"Apache Jira Automation","createdById":"1fadb195-1b94-430c-bdc9-bcf5bc9f9d8c","assignee":"Apache Jira Automation","assigneeId":"1fadb195-1b94-430c-bdc9-bcf5bc9f9d8c","project":"Dashboard Features","projectId":"ec212859-544d-4dad-95a3-c2abf42d1e22","team":"Tapestry 5","teamId":"7eff35e4-ffc8-4650-aa3b-5aaaeef3ac8c"}

message:
Got it — I validated the Linear issue: TAP5-2832 “Add CSV export for dashboard reports” (status: Open, project: Dashboard Features). Nice work.

Two quick choices before I write the Smartsheet row and create cross-links:
1) Smartsheet target — provide a workspace/sheet name or ID, or say “use default” to create Workspace: “Product Specs” / Sheet: “Feature Backlog”.  
2) Row assignee — who should I assign the row to in Smartsheet? (Want me to assign to Arjun? If yes, say “Arjun”.)

Optional: any priority/estimate to show on the row (e.g., P1 / 1d)? If you don’t care I’ll use sensible defaults.

Once you confirm I will:
- create the Smartsheet row with the feature title + 3–4 acceptance criteria,
- add a row discussion linking to TAP5-2832,
- add a comment on the Linear issue with the Smartsheet row link so both systems cross-link.

Which option for sheet and assignee?

message:
Use the default: create Workspace “Product Specs” / Sheet “Feature Backlog”.  
Assign the row to Arjun.  
Priority: P1, Estimate: 1d.  
Please pull title/description from TAP5-2832 and draft 3–4 acceptance criteria. Go ahead and create the row + discussion; paste the Smartsheet row link here when done and I’ll add a comment on TAP5-2832 linking it.
